p:
In this first example, we use the dataset ebola_sim_clean in the
outbreaks package, which provides a linelist for a fictitious outbreak of Ebola Virus Disease (EVD) that matches some key epidemiological properties (e.g. serial intervals, reproduction numbers) of the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014â€“2015 ( WHO Ebola Response Team et al., 2014 ).
